review: Well, I just came to eat here because I was shopping at Tangers but the food court there is horrible.  For lunch, this place was fairly busy but we got a table.  The waiters are on top of their game and very helpful.  The food itself is pretty good for the price; especially the 2 for 20 meal.  The boneless bbq wings are awesome appetizers.  The 7 oz steak tasted like charcoal but I asked for medium well.  Overall, this place is a great restaurant to eat at around the neighborhood.
Local spot for me. Used to go quite often.  Knew a lot of people, working and eating/drinking. Go after 10, obviously...
